title: Event and RSVP Management
description: A web app for creating events, sending invitations, and managing RSVPs with automated email confirmations. deployed on AWS Cloud.

title: E-learning Esi Sba

title: Attendy
description: class attendance management with a user-friendly interface for teachers and students, allowing easy tracking of attendance records.

title: ChatGPT Product Detector with CJ Affiliate Integration
